about_the_game:
Round-based action. The "curse" eliminates players one by one until the last man standing wins.

Utilize your grappling hook to get around the map fast. There are bouncy walls for you to gain momentum. Be warned, you have limited energy on your grappling hook and need to wait for it to recharge after usage.

When cursed, you have to pass it on to another player as fast as possible. If you are cursed when the timer runs down, you will EXPLODE.

Find powerups scattered around the play area to enhance your movement.



  • Powerups scattered around the map to give players an advantage.
  • Proximity voice chat so you can speak as your friends pass you by.
  • Dynamically crafted soundtrack with music changing as the game progresses.
  • Equippable cosmetics that get dropped after rounds.
  • Lobby settings to include a twist on the default gameplay.
  • Different maps to choose from, all with their own unique style.
  • Easy to learn, hard to master. The grappling hook alone can provide you with hours of fun, and you can learn by swinging while waiting for a new round to begin.
detailed_description:
Round-based action. The "curse" eliminates players one by one until the last man standing wins.

Utilize your grappling hook to get around the map fast. There are bouncy walls for you to gain momentum. Be warned, you have limited energy on your grappling hook and need to wait for it to recharge after usage.

When cursed, you have to pass it on to another player as fast as possible. If you are cursed when the timer runs down, you will EXPLODE.

Find powerups scattered around the play area to enhance your movement.



  • Powerups scattered around the map to give players an advantage.
  • Proximity voice chat so you can speak as your friends pass you by.
  • Dynamically crafted soundtrack with music changing as the game progresses.
  • Equippable cosmetics that get dropped after rounds.
  • Lobby settings to include a twist on the default gameplay.
  • Different maps to choose from, all with their own unique style.
  • Easy to learn, hard to master. The grappling hook alone can provide you with hours of fun, and you can learn by swinging while waiting for a new round to begin.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.1 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 680
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 Series
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 950
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Catch Me If You Can

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.1 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® UHD Graphics 630
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 Series
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Chase your friends in this heart-racing "Tag" based game. Use a grappling hook and bouncy physics to your advantage. Features proximity voice chat.
